suites.title: POST /register then /login to get a valid authorization value

tests.title: Verify Success Register First

tests.title: Verify Success Login
tests.fullTitle: POST /register then /login to get a valid authorization value Verify Success Login
tests.code:
const response = await request_url
    .post("/login")
    .send({ email: random_text + "@gmail.com", password: random_text });
    authorize_value = response.body.credentials.access_token; //update empty authorization with valid value
